ygData.subject: Re: Sean.Clark@UCHSC.edu
ygData.msgSnippet: This is one of those cases that would be great entertainment for court TV... get on Judge Judy... or one of the other court tv things. Id love to watch that :)
ygData.messageBody:
This is one of those cases that would be great entertainment for court TV... get on Judge Judy... or one of the other court tv things. Id love to watch that :)

Wes Lobdell,
Quote: +ACI-I don't want to achieve immortality through my work. I want to achieve
it through not dying.+ACI-
-Woody Allen
------------------------
My all time favorite Oxymorons:
exact estimate, plastic silverware, genuine imitation, mud bath, original copy, student teacher, alone together, anarchy rules, bitter sweet, bankrupt millionaire, black light, butt-head, casual sex, clean dirt, coed sorority, cold as hell, computer jock, constant change, cowardly lion, curved line(according to the mathematical definition of a line), delibrate mistake, dry wine, earth angel(ok thats just going back a ways +ADs-), educational television, even odds, found missing, freezer burn, fresh cheese, full-length bikini, half full, half naked, hard water, hells angels, idiot savant, jumbo shrimp, less is more, and finally my all time FAVORITE OXYMORON....: 'Microsoft works'+ACEAIQAhACEAIQAh-
-----Original Message-----
From: Lemac Justerian lemac+AEA-platinumsphere.com
To: EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com
Date: Wednesday, August 04, 1999 4:35 PM
Subject: Re: +AFs-EQCheats+AF0- Sean.Clark+AEA-UCHSC.edu


From: +ACI-Lemac Justerian+ACI- lemac+AEA-platinumsphere.com

What would probably happen (in a counter suit) would be not much... Mental
anguish won't fly, and you can't recover lost wages from having to go to
court...

BUT, he COULD sue him for maliciously filing a lawsuit... But he would only
have a 50/50 chance of winning that one if it was a one time thing and done
in small claims court... Besides which it would cost him money to FILE that
counter claim (which you recover only if you win).

I wouldn't worry about it though... There will be no suit, and if there is,
the judge will have a really good laugh with the bailiff and others in the
courtroom... Right before he dismisses the case and chews the plaintiff out
for having wasted the courts time+ACE-

(in case people are wondering, yes, I have spent many hours in Small Claims
court on several issues myself (usually collections), and at the same time
observing many more issues - Oh, and I was only the defendant once, which I
also won)

Lemac Justerian - High Elf Cleric on Karana server
Proud member of Platinum Sphere Guild - www.platinumsphere.com



----- Original Message -----
From: Steven Cobb cobb+AEA-systemsexpress.com
To: EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com
Sent: Wednesday, August 04, 1999 12:12 PM
Subject: Re: +AFs-EQCheats+AF0- Sean.Clark+AEA-UCHSC.edu


+AD4APg- From: Steven Cobb cobb+AEA-systemsexpress.com
+AD4APg-
+AD4APg- That is the part that truely amazes me. Besides the fact that he actually
told the
+AD4APg- entire world about it as well. Lemac's email details actually what his
lawyer should
+AD4APg- have told him to the first place.
+AD4APg-
+AD4APg- I think all this sean guy has to do to win the case now is just walk in to
court with
+AD4APg- printouts of this thread. Might even be evidence for a counter suit.
(Mental anguish
+AD4APg- and lost wages seems to be a popluar cry for money) It would be
interesting (once
+AD4APg- again if we cared) to find out how that would turn out if it actually ever
happened.
+AD4APg-
+AD4APg- +ACI-Kazen, Marc+ACI- wrote:
+AD4APg-
+AD4APg- From: +ACI-Kazen, Marc+ACI- Marc.Kazen+AEA-COMPAQ.com
+AD4APg-
+AD4APg- How can he charge a proof-reading fee if he never read it?
+AD4APg- Marc Kazen
+AD4APg-
+AD4APg- Subject: Re: +AFs-EQCheats+AF0- Sean.Clark+AEA-UCHSC.edu
+AD4APg-
+AD4APg- From: Steven Cobb cobb+AEA-systemsexpress.com
+AD4APg-
+AD4APg- Lemme get this straight, someone was sending him email that
+AD4APg- he didn't want (spam?)
+AD4APg- and in an effort to stop it told the guy that he would
+AD4APg- charge him a fee for reading
+AD4APg- his email. THEN doesn't read the email that was sent to him
+AD4APg- and is planning on going
+AD4APg- to small claims court to get the fee? THEN he spams us about
+AD4APg- it like we cared?
+AD4APg-
+AD4APg- I agree with the others on the list, Nick is silly indeed.
+AD4APg- Amazes me how people
+AD4APg- refuse to use something as simple as a killist and think
+AD4APg- this method would be a
+AD4APg- better solution.
+AD4APg-
+AD4APg- +AD4APg- Nick wrote:
+AD4APg- +AD4APg-
+AD4APg- +AD4APg- Well, I warned this person to stop emailing me. As per my
+AD4APg- +AD4APg- lawyers request I had
+AD4APg- +AD4APg- warned him before not to email me or a proof reading fee
+AD4APg- +AD4APg- would be exempted to his
+AD4APg- +AD4APg- university/his parents. He sent me an email this morning
+AD4APg- +AD4APg- that was lengthy and I
+AD4APg- +AD4APg- didn't even bother reading it. Again (to the people of
+AD4APg- +AD4APg- the list), do not send me
+AD4APg- +AD4APg- private emails. Mr. Clark is going to have to go to small
+AD4APg- +AD4APg- claims court because of his actions.
+AD4APg-
